title: "Must be level 7 or higher to post a comment"
body: I don't understand how I have been level 30 on League of Legends for quite some time, but am only level 5 here? Is it not updated on here for some reason or is it a completely separate leveling system? If so, how does one level up here? I would like to comment on posts. Thank you!

replies.body: Sometimes this boards level just gets out of sync with your Summoner level. Posting here in H&S or using the Syncing Tool stickied up top will get them readjusted again though. Looks like this did the trick, since I see you as level 30 now!
